resources.string: Choose the language for the app interface
The language change will take effect after restarting the app.
To change, please reset all data below
Scan your timetable as PDF to personalize the app
Choose the page displayed when the app starts
Shows only substitutions for your scanned or imported subjects
Only available when a timetable has been set up
Position of the temporary filter override button in the header
Update substitute plan automatically in the background
Notify about changes in the substitute plan
Adjusts important colors based on selected color blindness type
Shows and updates in real-time which lesson is currently running and which subject you have
Adds the weekend to the day overview
Reminds you before your homework is due
Reminds you daily about pending homework
Completed homework is automatically deleted after 3 days
Reminds you before your exams are due
Uses system setting for light/dark theme
Back up all your app data in a single .hks file (class/examination program, timetable, calendar, homework, exams, grades and app settings)
Delete all stored data and return to initial setup
• No data collection by the developer\n• All data remains on your device\n• Internet connection only to: heinrich-kleyer-schule.de (and optionally to: kultus.hessen.de)

• No ads or in-app purchases
• Background processes only when manually activated
• Notifications disabled by default
• Completely free and open source
The app may contain errors or incorrect information. Algorithms are not 100% error-free. The school may change the format of the substitute, exam or timetable. Use at your own risk.
For bug reports, suggestions or missing content:
This app does not process personal data. All settings and data are stored exclusively locally on your device. No transmission to third parties takes place.
The developer assumes no liability for the accuracy of the information displayed. The app is for information purposes only. For binding information, contact the school directly.
Welcome! Please first select your education program and your class to use the app.
Choose your education program from the list:
Choose your class from the list:

Homework description…
- Task 1
- Task 2
Note: Additional information
Tip: Start lines with \'-\' for checklists. You can mix text and checklists.
For change notifications to work reliably:
Notifications must be enabled for this app
Battery optimization should be disabled for this app
Do you want to update the grades page with the new subjects?
Do you really want to delete the scanned timetable?
Are you sure you want to reset all stored data?\n\nThis will return you to the initial setup.
The backup file contains no usable data
To load all changes correctly, an app restart is recommended. Restart the app now?
No email app found. Please copy the email address manually: theactualcooker@gmail.com
This will replace the current timetable.
The following sections will be restored:
This will replace the current data in these sections!

Hello,

I have a question/problem with the app:

Import timetable?

School year: %s
Class: %s
Subjects: %d

This will replace the current timetable.
Move to the next class or another year of your education program without losing all your data.
Choose your new class. Your grade data can be transferred if needed.
You are advancing to a higher class

Shows a legend explaining colors in the calendar
You have selected %d subjects. Do you want to discard the selection?
Do you really want to delete the subject \'%s\'?
Subject must be at least 2 characters long
A subject with the name \'%s\' already exists
Please enter at least one subject
You have not selected any subjects. Continue anyway?
Please enter at least one subject
Subject \'%s\' with identical data already exists

The education program \"%s\" has not been fully tested yet. Some functions might not work as expected.\n\nIf you encounter problems, please contact the developer via the email address in the app information (Settings).

Can't find your education program or class?

It's possible that not all education programs or classes have been added yet. Contact the developer and he will help you as quickly as possible!

Email: theactualcooker@gmail.com

I'm missing the following education program/class in the app:

Please enter a grade between 1.0 and 6.0
This will permanently delete all your saved grade history data. This action cannot be undone!
All previous grade data will be deleted and the new subjects will be loaded. Do you want to continue?
